title: Red Tornado Vintage Summer Men's Jeans Selvedge Denim Pants Slim Fit Low Rise Denim Jeans Washed Blue
description: DURABLE MATERIALS: This slim fit blue jean is with straight leg,made with durable cotton denim that will hold up over time -- even through long days on the job; 99% Cotton, 1% Spandex(make the pants microelasticity ); Not the same size with US size,if you do not like it tight fit,please buy one size up. and if you exercise regularly,with muscles in the hip and thighs,please must take one size larger;

SELVEDGE DENIM WILL FADE:Vintage mens selvedge denim jeans,with red Selvedge,mid rise pants,which is 12oz red-line selvedge denim,lightweight jeans in Dark Blue,good for Summer,Fall and Spring;Warp yarn and the weft yarn dyed that will fade over time

CLASSIC 5-POCKET STYLING:Slim straight jeans men - retro slim fit jeans designed with an authentic five-pocket style.Front pockets are with copper rivetsm,make the pants stronger; a timeless five-pocket style, perfect for most occasions.Selvedge Denim Pants with great details.

JEANS FOR ALL:This jean is slim fit,but will not tight,made of 12oz denim with one wash, will not shrink again after wash. Add a classic denim jean to your everyday rotation or try out a new alternative wash
SPECIFICATIONS:Button fly jeans men;Red Tornado signature real leather label at back waistband,match with many kind of shoe:sports shoes,leather shoes,boots,casual shoes,etc.

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY:Focus on Vintage clothing,Red Tornado has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Red Tornado is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.
This Men's slim fit jeans made from 12oz selvedge denim,great for summer;the material is 99% Cotton, 1% Spandex;Color:IndigoThis Jeans is Slim fit with Microelasticity,you can wear it as casual pants
